free from contact or
proximity or connection ;

the immediate
proximity of someone or something ;

any of the nine large celestial_bodies in the solar_system that revolve_around the sun and shine by reflected light ; Mercury , Venus , Earth , Mars , Jupiter , Saturn , Uranus , Neptune , and Pluto in order of their
proximity to the sun ; viewed from the constellation Hercules , all the planets rotate around the sun in a counterclockwise direction ;
